heading: HB08111
0: AN ACT REORGANIZING THE COMELEC OFFICES
principal-authors: DATOL, FRANCISCO JR. G.; SUAREZ, DANILO E.; BELMONTE, FELICIANO JR. ;
status: Pending with the Committee on SUFFRAGE AND ELECTORAL REFORMS since 2018-08-28
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08111
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REORGANIZING THE COMELEC OFFICES
ABSTRACT : Creates different positions in COMELEC field offices in the regional, provincial, and national capital region; provides for the reclassification and upgrading of the rank and file plantilla positions through higher salary grades.
ALIAS NAME : “ An Act Recognizing COMELEC Offices.”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : DATOL, FRANCISCO JR. G., SUAREZ, DANILO E., BELMONTE, FELICIANO JR.
DATE FILED : 2018-08-15
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
